body_html:
Yes, I know grpc is required. But what we need is incremential downloading, not redownload the whole package when failed to build the project. As you known, the grpc is more than 200M! My network is not good and every time in rebuilding it takes serval hours to download the grpc package.
The url of boringssl is not accesible under the Great Firewall of China.

body:
Yes, I know grpc is required. But what we need is incremential downloading, not redownload the whole package when failed to build the project. As you known, the grpc is more than 200M! My network is not good and every time in rebuilding it takes serval hours to download the grpc package.
The url of [boringssl](https://boringssl.googlesource.com/boringssl) is not accesible under the Great Firewall of China.
